title: Smart Data Models - GovHydroPelton
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Detailed hydro unit - Pelton model.  This model can be used to represent the dynamic related to water tunnel and surge chamber. A schematic of the hydraulic system of detailed hydro unit models, like Francis and Pelton, is located under the GovHydroFrancis class.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovHydroPelton

av0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Area of the surge tank (A). Unit = m. Typical Value = 30. Default: 0.0

av1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Area of the compensation tank (A). Unit = m. Typical Value = 700. Default: 0.0

bp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Droop (bp).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

db1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intentional dead-band width (DB1).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

db2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intentional dead-band width of valve opening error (DB2). Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0.0

h1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Head of compensation chamber water level with respect to the level of penstock (H).  Unit = m. Typical Value = 4. Default: 0.0

h2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Head of surge tank water level with respect to the level of penstock (H).  Unit = m. Typical Value = 40. Default: 0.0

hn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rated hydraulic head (H).  Unit = m. Typical Value = 250. Default: 0.0

kc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Penstock loss coefficient (due to friction) (Kc).  Typical Value = 0.025. Default: 0.0

kg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Water tunnel and surge chamber loss coefficient (due to friction) (Kg).  Typical Value = -0.025. Default: 0.0

qc0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. No-load turbine flow at nominal head (Qc0).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

qn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rated flow (Q). Unit = m/s. Typical Value = 40. Default: 0.0

simplifiedPelton.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Simplified Pelton model simulation (Sflag). true = enable of simplified Pelton model simulation false = enable of complete Pelton model simulation (non linear gain). Typical Value = false. Default: False

staticCompensating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Static compensating characteristic (Cflag). true = enable of static compensating characteristic  false = inhibit of static compensating characteristic. Typical Value = false. Default: False

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Derivative gain (accelerometer time constant) (Ta).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

ts.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gate servo time constant (Ts).  Typical Value = 0.15. Default: 0

tv.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Servomotor integrator time constant (TV).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

twnc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Water inertia time constant (Twnc).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

twng.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Water tunnel and surge chamber inertia time constant (Twng). Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

tx.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Electronic integrator time constant (Tx).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

va.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate opening velocity (Va).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0.016. Default: 0.0

valvmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate opening (ValvMax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

valvmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum gate opening (ValvMin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

vav.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum servomotor valve opening velocity (Vav).  Typical Value = 0.017. Default: 0.0

vc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate closing velocity (Vc).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = -0.016. Default: 0.0

vcv.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum servomotor valve closing velocity (Vcv).  Typical Value = -0.017. Default: 0.0

waterTunnelSurgeChamberSimulation.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Water tunnel and surge chamber simulation (Tflag). true = enable of water tunnel and surge chamber simulation false = inhibit of water tunnel and surge chamber simulation. Typical Value = false. Default: False

zsfc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Head of upper water level with respect to the level of penstock (Zsfc).  Unit = m. Typical Value = 25. Default: 0.0
